channel.title: ! starting a server and i'm lost... ! [need help!]
channel.description:
yeah. i just downloaded a server from the server download files forum... and now i uploaded it to:
xeno.mcgltd.org
now what do i do to start my server? (as in to make it playable)
someone please tell me/walk me through.
[b][shadow=red,left][[if you do, i'll make you an admin! :D :eek: ]][/shadow][/b]
